author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
In today's China, "brain death" might not mean what you think. Healthy teens and even toddlers are being declared brain-dead—just before their organs are harvested for profit. This exposé uncovers chilling real cases: a 15-year-old martial arts student found dismembered and missing kidneys; a college student’s organs removed hours after a hospital visit; a 2-day-old baby made “China’s youngest donor.”

Hospitals, police, and the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) are working together in a massive, industrial-scale organ trade operation. Kids are vanishing. Blood tests in schools may be used for secret organ matching. And the so-called “brain death” loophole is their legal shield.

This is not science fiction. This is happening. Right now.

Watch the full investigation to understand how ordinary Chinese families are being targeted—and why no one is safe.
title: China’s Organ Banks Are Full of Kids—And You Might Be Next
